item.title: Crypto Fear & Greed Index currently at 51, market sentiment holding steady.
item.description: On September 8th, based on alternative data, the cryptocurrency fear and greed index for today is 51 (yesterday it was 44). Market sentiment remains stable and continues to be "Neutral".Note: The threshold for the fear index is 0-100 and includes the following indicators: Volatility (25%) + Market Volume (25%) + Social Media Hype (15%) + Market Surveys (15%) + Bitcoin's Share of the Entire Market (10%) + Google Trends Analysis (10%).

item.title: Aster will hold its TGE on September 17th, and Aster Genesis Stage 2 is now live.
item.description: September 8th. According to official channels, the decentralized exchange platform Aster is scheduled to conduct its TGE on September 17th, with the collection of airdrop inquiries. The tokenomics will be announced at a later time.Moreover, the Aster Genesis Stage 2 has been launched, which introduces a multi-dimensional scoring system. The scoring dimensions encompass transaction volume, the holding period of Aster assets, profit and loss status, etc.

item.title: Metaplanet Acquires an Additional 136 Bitcoin
item.description: On September 8th, according to official channels, Metaplanet declared that it has augmented its stake in 136 Bitcoins. By September 8th, Metaplanet's overall Bitcoin holdings have increased to 20,136 coins, and the average purchase price is $103,196.

item.title: Less than ten days away from the Fed's September interest rate meeting, traders are starting to bet on an October rate cut
item.description: September 8th. With fewer than ten days remaining until the Fed's September interest rate meeting, current market traders are placing high bets on a rate cut in September and simultaneously elevating the probability of a rate cut in October.According to CME's "FedWatch" data, the likelihood of the Fed not implementing a rate cut in September currently stands at 0, with a 90% chance of a 25-basis-point rate cut. This probability is reported to be 87% on Polymarket.Moreover, traders are beginning to make wagers on a rate cut in October. CME data indicates that if the Fed cuts rates in September, the probability of another 25-basis-point rate cut in October is 71.6%, which represents a substantial increase from last week's 48%.

item.title: Ethereum-Based Stablecoins Hit a Total Market Cap of $165 Billion, Reaching an All-Time High
item.description: On September 8th, based on Token Terminal data, the total market capitalization of stablecoins on Ethereum has reached $165 billion, setting a new record high.

item.title: Bitunix Analyst: Escalation of Russia-Ukraine Conflict and Trump's Sanctions Posture Boost Market Risk-Off Sentiment
item.description: September 8th: In the largest-scale airstrike since the Russian invasion began, a significant government building in the center of Kyiv caught fire, resulting in casualties and infrastructure damage in multiple regions. President Trump of the United States has made it explicit that he is ready to initiate the "second-stage sanctions" against Russia. Secretary Yellen of the U.S. Treasury has also disclosed that the U.S. and Europe may impose additional tariffs on countries purchasing Russian oil in order to further constrict Moscow's financial resources. In the macro market, as risk aversion intensifies, there is a resurgence of demand for U.S. bonds, and the U.S. dollar index remains within a certain range. Geopolitical conflicts and sanction risks may exert upward pressure on energy prices, further influencing inflation expectations. The market is focusing on the upcoming inflation data and the future policy direction of the Federal Reserve, with the potential for increased volatility

item.title: Binance Alpha Futures Section Witnesses Significant Token Price Surges, with MYX and TALE Leading the Way
item.description: On September 8th, based on market data, certain tokens in the Binance Alpha sector experienced significant gains today. MYX and TALE took the lead. The details are as follows:MYX witnessed a 173.39% increase in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $3.7;TA saw a 74% increase in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $0.17706;TALE saw a 68% increase in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $0.005185;TOWN saw a 56% increase in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $0.006358.BlockBeats reminds users that the prices of these related tokens are highly volatile, and users should invest with caution.

item.title: Frax Founder Discusses Hyperliquid USDH Competition: Interoperability Value Over Yield
item.description: On September 8th, Sam Kazemian, the founder of Frax, stated in a social media post that the key insight of the Hyperliquid USDH event is that the true value of a stablecoin issuer lies in the interoperability and deep integration of the economic distribution chain rather than the obtainable sovereign bond yield.He stated that candidate parties, including Frax and Paxos, are willing to return 100% of the yield to Hyperliquid, but the actual value should far exceed yield sharing.

item.title: A whale went long on PUMP with 5x leverage, with a total position of approximately $6.3 million.
item.description: On September 8th, based on the monitoring of LookOnChain, a whale has established 3 wallets within the past 8 hours and gone long on PUMP with a leverage of 5 times. The total position is 1.31 billion PUMP tokens, which is equivalent to approximately $6.3 million.

item.title: SOMI, MYX, WLFI 24-Hour Liquidation Volume Surpasses Bitcoin
item.description: On September 8th, according to Coinglass data, within the past 24 hours, the liquidation volume of SOMI, MYX, and WLFI all exceeded that of Bitcoin. Among them:- SOMI surged by more than 56% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $1.64. The liquidation volume in the past 24 hours was $17.4 million, mainly from short positions, and the current contract funding rate is negative.- MYX surged by more than 180% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $3.73. The liquidation volume in the past 24 hours was $13.5 million, mainly from short positions, and the current contract funding rate is positive.- WLFI surged by more than 2% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $0.23. The liquidation volume in the past 24 hours was $12.2 million, experiencing both long and short liquidations, and the current contract funding rate is positive.
